subject:
Re: [cc-community] Do you know about case study on why it is better
	to use CC instead of full Copyright?
body:
Dessi Pefeva :
> I missed the word "full" before copyright.
The Creative Commons licenses uses the regular old copyright. There'snothing "less copyrighted" about it compared to "all rights reserved"distribution.
-- Björn Lindström Student of computational linguistics, Uppsala University, Sweden
